## OWebEvent.trigger() method

Trigger an event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected trigger(event: string, data?: any[], cancelable?: boolean, context?: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | string | The event name. |
|  data | any\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The data to be passed as arguments to the event handlers. |
|  cancelable | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> When true the event will stop when a handler returns false. |
|  context | any | <i>(Optional)</i> The context in which each handler will be called. Default: this. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
